messages.message: File Browsing continues to be very slow [after a few minutes of browsing] for me in demos today too.

Hi Anant, thanks for letting us know! Yes, we did see that list_dir requests taking longer during that period of time. I am looking into this to understand the root cause, but just wanted to clarify that `list_dir` request goes through thrift file service, which is a different route from the read/write file requests.
oops.. I didn't mean to say that this a bug with grpc -- I was just reporting file explorer browsing (directory listing) being very slow in the demos.
